summary: This document is an email chain between FBI personnel and U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman discussing a news report about Prince Andrew meeting with Ghislaine Maxwell in London in June 2019. The FBI agents emphasize the need for proactive efforts to locate Maxwell before obtaining probable cause for her arrest.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.role: U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Forwards a news report about Prince Andrew meeting Ghislaine Maxwell to FBI personnel, stating he has no idea if the report is accurate.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Subject of a forwarded news report alleging he met with Ghislaine Maxwell in London in June 2019.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of an FBI discussion about locating her; a news report alleges she met with Prince Andrew in London in June 2019.

connections.description: A forwarded news report alleges they met in London in June 2019.
Berman, as U.S. Attorney, is involved in correspondence regarding efforts to locate Maxwell as part of an investigation.

events.title: Alleged Meeting Between Prince Andrew and Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A news report alleges that Prince Andrew met with Ghislaine Maxwell in London.

events.title: FBI Email Chain Regarding Maxwell
events.description: FBI personnel and U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman correspond about a news report and the need for proactive efforts to locate Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: A news report from November 2019 alleged Prince Andrew met with Ghislaine Maxwell in London in June 2019.
U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman forwarded the report to FBI personnel, noting he did not know its accuracy.
FBI personnel discussed ensuring a 'proactive and thorough' hunt for Maxwell to have her 'in pocket' before obtaining probable cause for arrest.
The correspondence indicates active investigative planning regarding Maxwell's location in late November 2019.
